plugins\/blink_camera\/core\/class\/blin.Impossible de se connecter au compte Bli: Unable to connect at your Blink account. Check your Id and password. Reload this page after.

plugins\/blink_camera\/desktop\/js\/blin.Erreur lors de la mise à jour de la conf: Error during the update of the configuration of the account.
plugins\/blink_camera\/desktop\/js\/blin.Erreur lors de la réinitialisation de la: Error during the reinitialization of the configuration of all accounts.
plugins\/blink_camera\/desktop\/js\/blin.Connexion à votre compte Blink OK mais u: Connection to your Blink account is OK but a pin code is needed
plugins\/blink_camera\/desktop\/js\/blin.Connexion à votre compte Blink OK - Emai: Connection to your Blink account is OK - An verification email is needed

plugins\/blink_camera\/desktop\/modal\/b.Vous allez recevoir un SMS de Blink avec: You will received a SMS from Blink with a pin code, you must fill it here and clic  "Send".

plugins\/blink_camera\/desktop\/php\/pan.Aucun objet racine trouvé. Pour en créer:
Aucun objet racine trouvé. Pour en créer un, allez dans Générale -> Objet.
Si vous ne savez pas quoi faire ou que c\'est la premiere fois que vous utilisez Jeedom n\'hésitez pas a consulter cette page

plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Vous allez recevoir un SMS de Blink avec: You will received a SMS from Blink with a pin code, you must fill it here and clic  "Send".
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Bloquer l'accès aux URLs des vidéos et i: Block access to video and image URLs without being authenticated in Jeedom?
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Adresse de Jeedom à utiliser pour les UR: Jeedom address to use for URLs
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Afficher la vignette de caméra s'il n'y: Show camera thumbnail if no video available?
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Les vignettes de vidéos ne sont pas disp: The thumbnails of the videos are not available if you use a local storage(USB).
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Mode eco desc:
This mode limits the amount of data exchanged in the historical view:
  • between Jeedom and your browser: a video is downloaded to your browser only when you click on it.
  • between Blink and Jeedom servers: only data already present on Jeedom is displayed.
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Inclure les vidéos\/images des caméras d: Include videos/images of cameras in the Jeedom backup ?
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.backup desc:
WARNING !
Be carefull : size of Jeedom backups can be very important
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Connexion à votre compte Blink OK mais u: The connection to your Blink account is OK but a pin code is requiered
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Connexion à votre compte Blink OK - Emai: The connection to your Blink account is OK but a pin code is requiered
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.Recherche des nouveaux évenements sur le: Search for new events on Blink servers
plugins\/blink_camera\/plugin_info\/conf.WARNING_INTERVAL: WARNING : If you configure a value that is too short, you can cause errors with Blink servers, or even cause Blink to lock your account!
